article_title: Capps faces growing field of challengers in congressional race
article_text: Republican Dale Francisco is the latest challenger to file papers to run against incumbent Lois Capps, a Democrat, for the 24th District congressional seat. Two other Republicans and one Democrat have also announced campaigns.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Francisco, Capps, Coyne, Fareed, Mitchum, congress, 24th district

Republican Dale Francisco is the latest challenger to file papers to run against incumbent Lois Capps, a Democrat, for the 24th District congressional seat.
Two other Republicans and one Democrat have also announced campaigns.
